title: Culture, Language, and Social Practice Fund
description: To support the Culture, Language and Social Practice Program including faculty and student research at CU Boulder.  The program is one of the nation's leading centers for interdisciplinary research on the relationship between language and society.
marketingContent: To support the Culture, Language and Social Practice Program including faculty and student research at CU Boulder.  The program is one of the nation's leading centers for interdisciplinary research on the relationship between language and society.
